quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.

quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. quote: Will some reporter, or some Republican on the Sunday shows, please ask why tax cuts raid the non-existent Social Security Trust Fund but all the Democrats' new spending doesn't? Will someone please ask that?

quote: Life is a gift, given in trust - like a child.

quote: The people of Wisconsin have been good to me. I've tried to live up to their trust. quote: The hardest thing to do is to trust people.

quote: There's obviously nothing wrong with selling your art - only an idiot with a trust fund would tell you otherwise. But it's confusing to know how far you should take it.

quote: Based on 30 years of experience with the Iranians, they will give you 100 words. Trust only one of the 100.
name: Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani

quote: Racial profiling punishes innocent individuals for the past actions of those who look and sound like them. It has no place in our national discourse, and no place in our nation's police departments.
name: Benjamin Todd Jealous

name: Aldrich Ames
